short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Music Stream Links Search is an upgraded music extension that allows to configure your Default Search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Music Stream Links Search is an easy-to-use functional tool that allows users to enjoy real custom search experience powered by Microsoft Bing, by configuring your Default Search to Music Stream Links Search.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install " Music Stream Links Search" Chrome extension and hereby agree to change default search to Music Stream Links Search provided by the service, and I agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

How to use:
Type search term into the Google Chrome Omnibox. The Music Stream Links Search will provide excellent custom search results powered by Bing.
For more technical details you can read about Google Chrome API for Google Chrome Extensions.

You may remove this extension at any time from the chrome extension page.

Visit our website at https://musicstreamlinks.com/
Read more about us: https://musicstreamlinks.com/about-search/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://musicstreamlinks.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms and Conditions: https://musicstreamlinks.com/terms-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://musicstreamlinks.com/uninstalling-a-chrome-extension/

Removal Instructions One:
Step 1: Right click on the extension in the top right corner of your browser.
Step 2: Click ‘Remove’
Or
Removal Instructions Two:
Step 1: Click on the three dots/horizontal lines icon in the top right corner of your Chrome browser.
Step 2: Go to "Settings".
Step 3: On the left-hand side, click on ‘Extensions’
Step 4: Find the extension that you wish to remove and click the ‘Remove’ button.
Step 5: The extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
